top.title: Minnesota immigration enforcement surge is ending, Trump border tsar says
top.summary: Two US citizens were killed in Minneapolis during the crackdown dubbed "Operation Metro Surge".

top.title: Kim Jong Un chooses teen daughter as heir, says Seoul
top.summary: South Korea's spy agency says Ki Ju Ae's prominent public presence indicates she is the chosen heir.

top.title: Norway's former PM charged with gross corruption over Epstein links
top.summary: The charge was brought after the Council of Europe lifted his immunity, which he had as its former secretary general.

top.title: Porn site fined £800,000 for not rolling out age checks
top.summary: Separately, message board 4chan says it will refuse to pay an expected £520,000 fine from the media regulator.

top.title: AI safety leader says 'world is in peril' and quits to study poetry
top.summary: It comes in the same week an OpenAI researcher resigned amid concerns about its decision to start testing ChatGPT ads.

top.title: Prince Harry thanks bereaved families taking on social media firms
top.summary: The Duke of Sussex addressed parents claiming Instagram and YouTube damage young people's mental health.

title.#text: Two powerful, OLED-equipped gaming laptops are hundreds off
Eufy’s midrange X10 Pro Omni robovac has fallen to its best-ever price
Jeffrey Epstein might not have created /pol/, but he helped carry out its mission
